group_1.textCenter: I'll message you later tonight!@Okay! Byeee!

group_1.textLeft: Phew...
(What's going on here?)[chara:303101:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:cheek_0]
We just went on a date...@So why do I feel so...blah?
(You got who you've been @in love with for forever...)
(Your dream came true! You're dating!)
(Aren't you happy?)
Of course I'm happy, but—
Hngyah!
Don't scare me like that!
Wait, how long have you been there?!
Were you watching us while we were on@our date?! Are you some sort of stalker?!

group_1.textRight: Your date does not concern me in the least.
I only care that you do your duty as@a Magical Girl and destroy Witches.

group_1.textLeft: Okay... If you say so.

group_1.textRight: I see none of this has cheered you up.
Yet your wish has just been granted.
You did agree to battle Witches in @return for granting your wish, but still...
Most girls at this point are...

group_1.textLeft: I don't know why I feel like this either...
Like, I chose this. I wanted it.
I'm happy that I'm with the person I love.
Like... Really happy.@It's just...
It also hurts.

group_1.narration: Every time my special someone@gives me that smile meant only@for me...my heart breaks a little.

group_1.textLeft: I could say, "Yay! My wish came true!@I've never been so happy in, like, ever!"
But it's not that simple...@People aren't that simple!
Gaaah! I should've just gone to a shrine@or temple and prayed for this to happen!
I would've been so, so happy if I did!
But no! I had to go and wish@to this little white fuzzball!
